    • Uses of Color in fast3d.complex.light

      Fields in fast3d.complex.light declared as Color 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Color Material.ambient
      the color used to illuminate with ambient light (background-light)
      Color Material.diffuse
      the color used to illuminate with diffuse light (directional/point-light)
      Color Material.emissive
      the color that is visible at minimum even if no light source shines to the surfaces with this material
      Color PointLight.lightColor
      the color of the light
      Color DirectionalLight.lightColor
      the color of the light (for sun a nice orange will do)
      Color AmbientLight.lightColor
      the color of the ambient light (should be for realistic scenarios some dark gray)
      Color Material.specular
      the color used to illuminate with specular light (shine-light)
      Methods in fast3d.complex.light that return Color 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Color Material.getAmbient() 
      Color Material.getDiffuse() 
      Color Material.getEmissive() 
      Color Material.getSpecular() 
      Color SpecularLight.illuminate(Illuminatable c) 
      Color PointLight.illuminate(Illuminatable c) 
      abstract Color ObstructableLight.illuminate(Illuminatable c) 
      Color Light.illuminate(Illuminatable illum)
      calculates the visible color for the given illuminatable;
      the visible color is the color of the pixels on the screen for the given renderable
      Color DirectionalLight.illuminate(Illuminatable c) 
      Color AmbientLight.illuminate(Illuminatable c) 
      Constructors in fast3d.complex.light with parameters of type Color 
      Constructor and Description
      AmbientLight(Color color)
      constructs some ambient lighting with the given color
      DirectionalLight(Universe uni, Color c, Vector3d dir)
      for illuminating it has to be calculated, whether an Illuminatable lays in the shadow of another
      Material(Color ambient, Color diffuse, Color specular, Color emissive, double shininess)
      initiates the materials data, opaque, no texture
      Material(Color ambient, Color diffuse, Color specular, Color emissive, double shininess, double alpha)
      initiates the materials data, no texture
      Material(Color ambient, Color diffuse, Color specular, Color emissive, double shininess, double alpha, Texture texture)
      initiates the materials data
      Material(Color ambient, Color diffuse, Color specular, Color emissive, double shininess, Texture texture)
      initiates the materials data
      PointLight(Universe uni, Color c, Vector3d pos)
      because this sort of light is located, it may be obstructed and cause shadow behind a Renderable
      SpecularLight(Universe uni, Color c, Vector3d dir)
      constructs a new shiny light

    • Uses of Color in fast3d.graphics

      Methods in fast3d.graphics that return Color 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Color Color.add(Color c)
      adds the r,g,b values from the parameter to this, alpha remains constant
      Color Color.clone() 
      Color Color.darker(double amount)
      reduces rgb
      Color Texture.getAbsolute(Vector2d coord)
      gives the color for a given pixel on the texture
      the coordinates are within 0..width or 0..height (overflow is managed automatically)
      Color Texture.getLogical(Vector2d coord)
      gives the color for a given pixel on the texture
      the coordinates are within 0..1 (overflow is managed automatically)
      Color Graphics3d.illuminateSurface(Illuminatable illum)
      does the lighting calculation for any used light and combines them to the visible color for the given surface
      static Color Graphics3d.illuminateSurface(Illuminatable illum, Light... lights)
      does the lighting calculation for any given light and combines them to the visible color for the given surface
      Color Color.invert()
      inverts the rgb-range
      the inverted value of any rgb-value is ( 1 - value )
      alpha will be constant
      Color Color.invertWithAlpha()
      does the same as invert() but also inverts the alpha
      Color Color.lighter(double amount)
      raises rgb
      static Color Color.mix(Color... colors)
      calculates the average color for the given ones
      Color Color.setOpaque()
      sets the alpha component to 1d
      Color Color.setSemiOpaque()
      sets the alpha component to 0.5d
      Color Color.setTransparent()
      sets the alpha component to 0d
      Color Color.sub(Color c)
      subtracts the r,g,b values from the parameter to this, alpha remains constant
      Methods in fast3d.graphics with parameters of type Color 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Color Color.add(Color c)
      adds the r,g,b values from the parameter to this, alpha remains constant
      static Color Color.mix(Color... colors)
      calculates the average color for the given ones
      void Graphics3d.setColor(Color col)
      converts the given color to the corresponding one from awt and sets the backing graphics2D to that
      Color Color.sub(Color c)
      subtracts the r,g,b values from the parameter to this, alpha remains constant

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Color Triangle.getColor() 
      Color Rectangle.getColor() 
      Color Pixel.getColor()
      the pixels color (rgb) might be changed by the (xyz)-coordinates of the casted vector3d
      Color Line.getColor() 
      Color HUD.getColor() 
      Color CrosshairHUD.getColor()
      returns a clone
      Color Callout.getColor()

      Constructors in fast3d.renderables with parameters of type Color 
      Constructor and Description
      AdvTriangle(Vector3d a, Vector3d b, Vector3d c, Color ambient, Color diffuse, Color specular, Color emissive, double shininess, Vector3d normal)
      call the super constructor
      sets a custom normal vector for lighting calculation
      for correct lighting the normal vector should be orthogonal to this and normalized
      CrosshairHUD(int sizePX, Color color)
      constructs a new crosshair with the stroke-length of sizePX and the given color
      Line(Vector3d a, Vector3d b, Color c)
      constructs a line from start to end with the color c
      Pixel(Vector3d pos, Color col)
      constructs a new 3d-pixel on the specified location and with the specified color
      both can be changed directly by the references given by getPos() and getColor()
      Rectangle(Vector3d a, Vector3d b, Vector3d c, Vector3d d, Color color)
      constructs a rectangle with the given edges
      Text(java.lang.String text, double size, Color color)
      a default constructor
      fontname is Arial
      awt_mod is java.awt.Font.PLAIN
      Text(java.lang.String text, double size, Color color, int... awt_mod)
      a default constructor
      fontname is Arial
      Text(java.lang.String text, java.lang.String fontname, double size, Color color, int... awt_mod) 
      Triangle(Vector3d a, Vector3d b, Vector3d c, Color color)
      constructs a triangle with the given edges

    • Uses of Color in fast3d.simple.shapes

      Methods in fast3d.simple.shapes with parameters of type Color 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void GeometricBodyBuilder.setColor(Color c)
      to set if the resulting geometric body has to be made out of simple Triangles
      void GeometricBodyBuilder.setMaterial(Color average)
      to set if the resulting geometric body has to be made out of AdvTriangles
      the emissive color will be black, shininess = 25 and alpha = opaque

    • Uses of Color in fast3d.util

      Methods in fast3d.util that return Color 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Color ColorGen.BLACK() 
      static Color ColorGen.BLUE() 
      static Color ColorGen.CORNFLOWER_BLUE() 
      static Color ColorGen.DARK_GRAY() 
      static Color ColorGen.from255ARGB(int argb)
      gets an int where:
      bits-indices color-component
      32-24 alpha
      23-16 red
      15-08 green
      08-00 blue
      static Color ColorGen.from255RGB(double r, double g, double b)
      converts a color with rgb-range 0 to 255 (like in the awt-color-model) to one of the range 0 to 1
      static Color ColorGen.from255RGB(int rgb)
      converts a rgb-color-integer (like in the awt-color-model) to a color
      static Color ColorGen.from255RGBA(double r, double g, double b, double a)
      converts a color with rgba-range 0 to 255 (like in the awt-color-model) to one of the range 0 to 1
      static Color ColorGen.from255RGBA(int rgba)
      converts a rgba-color-integer (like in the awt-color-model) to a color
      static Color ColorGen.fromAWTColor(java.awt.Color c)
      a wrapper to from255RGBA()
      static Color ColorGen.fromAWTColorWithoutAlpha(java.awt.Color c)
      a wrapper to from255RGB()
      static Color ColorGen.fromHSB(double h, double s, double b)
      a wrapper to the awtColor-method getHSBColor
      all arguments within the range of [0d,1d]
      static Color ColorGen.fromVector(Vector3d vec)
      just copies the xyz-values to rgb, if the are in range of 0d to 1d
      if they are out of range they are constraint: all values over 1 are set to 1, all values under 0 are set to 0
      static Color ColorGen.fromVector(Vector4d vec)
      just copies the xyza-values to rgba, if the are in range of 0d to 1d
      if they are out of range they are constraint: all values over 1 are set to 1, all values under 0 are set to 0
      static Color ColorGen.genLinear(double wl)
      a not scientific way to convert a value between 0 and 1 to a color, where 0 means red, 0.5 means green and 1 means blue
      static Color ColorGen.genPhysically(double wavelength)
      a scientifically nearly correct way to convert the wavelength of light to a rgb-color in the visible spectrum
      a value of 380 will be ultra-violet
      a value of 780 will be infra-red
      static Color ColorGen.genRealistic(double wl)
      a wrapper to genPhysically() but with a mathematical range of values
      a value of 1 will be ultra-violet
      a value of 0 will be infra-red
      so with look to genPhysically() the range of values is flipped
      static Color ColorGen.GRAY() 
      static Color ColorGen.GREEN() 
      static Color ColorGen.LIGHT_GRAY() 
      static Color ColorGen.ORANGE() 
      static Color ColorGen.random() 
      static Color ColorGen.randomOpacity() 
      static Color ColorGen.randomOpacity(double opacity) 
      static Color ColorGen.randomPhysically() 
      static Color ColorGen.RED() 
      static Color ColorGen.TRANSPARENT_BLACK() 
      static Color ColorGen.TRANSPARENT_WHITE() 
      static Color ColorGen.WHITE() 
      static Color ColorGen.YELLOW() 

    • Uses of Color in fast3d.util.serial

      Methods in fast3d.util.serial that return Color 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Color VecBinaryReader.readColor()
      just another way of writing read4() - but read4() gives no color
      Color[] VecBinaryReader.readColor(int amount)
      just another way of writing read4(amount) - but read4() gives no color
